about_the_game:
Build, Trade, Thrive: Your Medieval VR Adventure Begins

Embark on a brief yet immersive journey into the medieval world of The First Settlement VR. In this 20-minute demo, you’ll lay the foundations of your very own town, selecting from over 30 unique buildings that shape its economy and culture. Experience the challenges of managing complex production chains, from essential foodstuffs to luxury goods, as you meet the needs and desires of your townspeople.

Engage in trade with neighboring towns, securing scarce resources or turning a profit from your surplus. In this demo, you're not just an overseer; you're an integral part of the community. Walk the streets, observe your surroundings, and witness the immediate impact of your strategic choices.

Your journey may be brief, but the world of The First Settlement VR awaits your full exploration.
